channel.title: Introduction to MESG
channel.description:
With MESG, you can build applications that easily connect any technologies together, including any blockchains or Web APIs. Imagine the possibilities of any technology connecting to anything else with data through a decentralized network. There has never been a solution quite like this before.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/introduction-to-mesg-chapter-0-1/
